text: The Movement for Socialismâ€“Political Instrument for the Sovereignty of the Peoples (, abbreviated MAS-IPSP, or simply MAS), alternately referred to as the Movement Toward Socialism or the Movement to Socialism ( ), is a Bolivian left-wing populist and indigenist political party led by Evo Morales, founded in 1998. Its followers are known as Masistas. == References == Category:1998 establishments in South America Category:Political parties in South America Category:Politics of Bolivia Category:Organizations based in Bolivia
title: Movement for Socialism (Bolivia)
